name: 14-splash-divtober-2022
title: 14. Splash - Divtober 2022
description: This entry skirted around the need to make water droplets that I just didn't have the energy for.  So here is the #divtober 2022 entry for "splash" going with the 1984 Tom Hanks / Darryl Hannah classic rom-com instead.
